title: Nets Say Kyrie Irving’s Apology Isn’t Enough, and Nike Suspends Its Ties
description: Irving was suspended after he would not say he held no antisemitic beliefs. Nike suspended its relationship with him Friday.
dc:creator: Sopan Deb
media:description: Until he was suspended Thursday, Nets guard Kyrie Irving had resisted calls to apologize for linking to an antisemitic film on Twitter.
